name: Dinodon
description:
Dinodon is an action arcade game with RPG elements.

A huge monster got into a residential city and destroys entire neighborhoods!
All the military equipment of the city is put against him, but nothing can save them.
from the fire of an angry monster.

Destroy cities by shooting huge balls of fire.
Buy new armor and upgrade the monster.
Use your mouse to shoot.
Use W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics.
- Random level generation.
- Leveling the character.
